manifest.name: Detective Agency Pack
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: Solve mysteries and uncover clues with this detective-themed quest pack.

quests.title: The Case of the Missing Sock
quests.description: A lone sock has been found, its partner vanished without a trace! Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to search the laundry piles and restore order by finding its match.

quests.title: Gather Fingerprints
quests.description: The sock case is cold, but new evidence is needed. Help dust a room for 'fingerprints' (as part of a normal cleaning) to see who the culprit might be.

quests.title: Interview a Witness
quests.description: You have a suspect! Ask a family member three questions about their day and listen carefully to their alibi.
